translations: 受要约人；接盘人，[贸易] 受盘人；[贸易] 被发价人

sentences.sentence: All the terms of the offer must be communicated to the offeree.
sentences.translation: 要约的全部内容都必须送达给受要约人。

sentences.sentence: An offeror may withdraw his offer at any time before the offeree has accepted it.
sentences.translation: 一个要约人可以在受要约人承诺以前的任何时候，撤销他的要约。

sentences.sentence: The notice of withdrawal shall reach the offeree before or at the same time as the offer.
sentences.translation: 撤销要约的通知应当在受要约人发出承诺通知之前到达受要约人。
